mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notification (userId, type, typeId, message, summary, status, createdAt, coupleId) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{typeId}, #{message}, #{summary}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{coupleId});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Notification WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY createdAt DESC;
SELECT userId FROM Notification WHERE notificationId = #{notificationId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Notification SET status = #{status}, readAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE notificationId = #{notificationId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Notification WHERE typeId = #{scheduleId} AND type LIKE '일정%';
DELETE FROM Notification WHERE typeId = #{requestId} AND type = '커플 신청';
